title: President Bush Is Haunted, Gaming Increases Intelligence 05.20.22
itunes:title: President Bush Is Haunted, Gaming Increases Intelligence 05.20.22
description:
In episode 1252, Miles and guest co-host Matt Lieb are joined by comedian and host of The G Word, Adam Conover to discuss… The continued disconnect between legislators and health workers, Freudian Slip of the Century, TOLD YOU SO MOM - video games INCREASE intelligence? And more!

  1. The continued disconnect between legislators and health workers
  2. Freudian Slip of the Century
  3. TOLD YOU SO MOM - video games INCREASE intelligence?

LISTEN: Golden Green by Emma-Jean Thackray

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
